Laurian Gridinoc wrote:
> java version "1.6.0_01"
> Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_01-b06)
> Java HotSpot(TM) Server VM (build 1.6.0_01-b06, mixed mode)

It's a long shot, but...
Though 1.6 should be stable, I've only used 1.5 myself -- 1.5.0_07-b03 
lately.  I wonder if there could be a new bug in 1.6?

(That said, I don't have any specific evidence behind this hypothesis.)
